title: Guitar Hero I and 80s beta (custom)
description:
***IF YOU HAVE ANY COMPLAINTS GO FUCK YOURSELVES!!!  THE SHIT IS FREE AND YOU ARE POOR ;-)  OTHERWISE... ENJOY THIS FINE RELEASE!!

Guitar.Hero.I.and.80s.beta.Wii.iso
This is a modified version of Guitar Hero 3 for the Wii.  It includes tracks from the Guitar Hero I and Guitar Hero 80&#039;s.  Disc was tested on NTSC-U Wiis with firmware 3.2U.  Chips tested were YAOSM 2.0 and Wiikey 1.9b.  This should work on any modded PAL or NTSC-U Wii.  Online play is strongly not recommended.  Quick Play mode is your safest option.  This disc uses the GH3 PAL gamesave slot so NTSC users will not have their high scores changed.  If you don&#039;t see all the songs in Quick Play, enter the unlock all songs cheat code: (YO) (RB) (RO) (GB) (RY) (YO) (RY) (RB) (GY) (GY) (YB) (YB) (YO) (YO) (YB) (Y) (R) (RY) (R) (Y) (O).  Please to enjoy.
